step_feedback.feedback: Great start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Good movement. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together as you roll them down.
Nice job completing the first roll! Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Excellent second start! You're maintaining good form.
Smooth motion. Continue to focus on the backward and downward roll of the shoulder blades.
Fantastic finish! You completed both rolls with excellent control and form. Keep up the great work!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to squeeze your shoulder blades back and down. Try to inhale deeply when pulling your shoulders back to help with lymphatic flow and breathing.
